forthcoming.translation[0].definitions[0: a forthcoming event, meeting etc is one that has been planned to happen soon
Keep an eye on the noticeboards for forthcoming events.
forthcoming.translation[0].definitions[1: willing to give information about something
IBM is usually pretty forthcoming about the markets for its products.
forthcoming.translation[0].definitions[2: if something is forthcoming, it is given or offered when needed â€“ often used to say that this does not happen
When no reply was forthcoming, she wrote again.
